attributes.action: Jeremy Clarkson should NOT be sacked for what he said regarding Public Sector strikes
attributes.additional_details: As the media will no doubt be unable to give Mr Clarkson any support for fear of the unions I have decided to set up this petition. It is a place to show our support for Mr Clarkson and our support for freedom of speech regardless of whether you are on television or not. Of course I dont agree that public sector workers should be shot for striking but I like the majority of the country was completly outraged with the sectors greed, selfishness, audacity and timing of the strike. When any employer is in a  ridiculous ammount of debt you have to accept cuts, so the stupidity of the strikers is beyond amazing. I understand Mr Clarksons frustration and anger, this was not inciting hatred as the public sector did that themselves by striking. Besides it was only a joke.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC.

It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
